tags: None
review: I consulted Dr Swagatha over phone. She is extremely sweet and gives great advice. She‚Äôs not a doctor who will just recommend pills. She listens to your problem and gives advice for better health and long term future also. I‚Äôll definitely keep consulting her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: The Doctor was very cooperative and discussed the problem with my Mother in law over call and suggested test and medicine . Also we had a follow up call after we got the reports . Thank you üôè. Will highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I contacted for wifes irregular periods but doctor lacks patience. she ended my consultation with one and only one question to get a test done. *** ***** *** ** *** ******* *** ******** ******* ********* ******** ******* **** *** ****** **** *** *** * ****** ** ****** ** ******** ** ** ********
reply_text: We doctors have studied for several years to attain knowledge and skills so that we can serve our patients.we are bound to follow certain protocol .if patients do not agree with the protocol of medical science we will not be able to help them further.Thank you .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Despite telling her that I've no sexual history at all, she asks me to get a pregnancy test. When I asked her the reason for it, *** ******* *********** **** ** *** kept on saying that I'm accusing her of calling me pregnant. I'm not as qualified as her and as a patient it is my prerogative to be apprised with the precise reason for recommending any test. ***** ** ** ******** *** ********* ********* ******** ** *** ******* **** ** ****** ******* ** *** * ********* ***** ****** *************** **** ******** ****
reply_text: I‚Äôm here to sincerely help my patients to the best of my knowledge and experience as gynaecologist and have been serving my dear patients .we as doctors need to follow certain protocol during treating patients.if patients are not comfortable with the protocol they definitely have option to back out and cancel consultations .This is definitely a big misunderstanding as doctors our intention is to always selflessly help patients.we never have any other intention .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The worsest experience ..she is not even listening the issue and coming to conclusion and arrogantly closed the consultation and insulted the patient asking doubt related to menopause
reply_text: I‚Äôm really sorry to state that we doctors are here to help patients to the best of our knowledge and experience.the comments are not true to the best of my knowledge.I will never insult any of my patients.it is the sad picture of our society that we doctors are targeted wrongly even if we try to help our patients.Thank you .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: she is humble and calm , speaks politely but after one meeting she doesn't reply to my messages. I'm still waiting for her reply.

tags: None
review: just had a chat with her and she's an angel ‚ô•Ô∏èsuch a humble and doctor with a lot of patience. i would recommend everyone to go with herüëè
reply_text: Thanks dear üòä will always try to make patients happy üòä

tags: None
review: I had a good experience with Dr Swagatha Maam! She is extremely polite and friendly and answer all the queries! I would strongly recommend everyone to consult her ! Sometimes positive attitude and assurance of a doctor have more impact on your prevailing condition than anything else:)
reply_text: Thank you so much dear üòä trying to keep patients happy üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: ****** ******** ** *** **** *** she listens to all our problems and health related issues and advices us holistically, prescribes medicines only if it's required. She is quite knowledgeable and adviced us the accurate things and the best part is she adviced to follow the remedies naturally (she has recommended few natural remedies). Thank you. RegardsSaroj PanigrahiBhubaneswar

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She did not give us proper advice as this is my first time pregnancy I was expecting some medical advices from the doctor. She was only answering the questions we asked that too not in polite manner. Definitely not recommended to a first time pregnant women.
reply_text: Sorry for the misunderstanding.I have given antenatal advice to the best of my knowledge and understanding.if patients are not satisfied which definitely might be a possibility we can always cancel consultations in which case patient will get a refund and also get a chance to connect with other colleagues.
